chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
g: R -> R
f: R -> R
ptd: SF_seq

Goal:
pointed_subdiv ptd -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd <= t <= last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) -> f t <= g t) -> Riemann_sum f ptd <= Riemann_sum g ptd

Premises:
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.t = positive : Set
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
Riemann_sum = fun (V : ModuleSpace R_Ring) (f : R -> V) (ptd : SF_seq) => foldr plus zero (pairmap (fun x y : R * R => scal (fst y - fst x) (f (snd y))) (SF_h ptd, zero) (SF_t ptd)) : forall V : ModuleSpace R_Ring, (R -> V) -> SF_seq -> V Argument V is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
Riemann_sum_norm : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (g0 : R -> R) (ptd0 : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv ptd0 -> (forall t : R, SF_h ptd0 <= t <= last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0) -> norm (f0 t) <= g0 t) -> norm (Riemann_sum f0 ptd0) <= Riemann_sum g0 ptd0 where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
Riemann_sum_Chasles_0 : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (M x : R) (ptd0 : SF_seq) (eps : posreal), (forall x0 : R, SF_h ptd0 <= x0 <= last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0) -> norm (f0 x0) < M) -> SF_h ptd0 <= x <= last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0) -> pointed_subdiv ptd0 -> seq_step (SF_lx ptd0) < eps -> norm (minus (plus (Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cut_down ptd0 x)) (Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cut_up ptd0 x))) (Riemann_sum f0 ptd0)) < 2 * eps * M where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- NormedModule R_AbsRing]
SF_cut_up_cons_2 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= SF_h ptd <= x -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cut_up ptd x
SF_cut_down_cons_2 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= SF_h ptd <= x -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons h (SF_cut_down ptd x)
Riemann_sum_zero : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (ptd0 : SF_seq), SF_sorted Rle ptd0 -> SF_h ptd0 = last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0) -> Riemann_sum f0 ptd0 = zero where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
foldr_rcons : forall (f0 : ?T0 -> ?T -> ?T) (x0 : ?T) (s : seq ?T0) (t : ?T0), foldr f0 x0 (rcons s t) = foldr f0 (f0 t x0) s where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
SF_cut_up_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (x, Rmax (snd h) x) ptd
SF_last_cat : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- Type]
Riemann_sum_const : forall (v : ?V) (ptd0 : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun _ : R => v) ptd0 = scal (last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0) - SF_h ptd0) v where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (fst h, Rmin (snd h) x) (SF_nil x)
Riemann_sum_rcons : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (ptd0 : SF_seq) (l0 : R * R), Riemann_sum f0 (SF_rcons ptd0 l0) = plus (Riemann_sum f0 ptd0) (scal (fst l0 - last (SF_h ptd0) (SF_lx ptd0)) (f0 (snd l0))) where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
norm_ge_0 : forall x : ?V, 0 <= norm x where ?K : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- AbsRing] ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- NormedModule ?K]
norm_triangle : forall x y : ?V, norm (plus x y) <= norm x + norm y where ?K : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- AbsRing] ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- NormedModule ?K]
Riemann_sum_map : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (g0 : R -> R) (ptd0 : SF_seq), Riemann_sum (fun x : R => f0 (g0 x)) ptd0 = Riemann_sum f0 (SF_map g0 ptd0) where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]
norm_scal : forall (l : ?K) (x : ?V), norm (scal l x) <= abs l * norm x where ?K : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- AbsRing] ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- NormedModule ?K]
SF_cut_up_l : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> last (SF_h (SF_cut_up s x)) (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) = last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
SF_cut_up_pointed : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h s <= x -> pointed_subdiv s -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cut_up s x)
SF_cut_down_pointed : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h s <= x -> pointed_subdiv s -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cut_down s x)
Riemann_sum_cons : forall (f0 : R -> ?V) (h0 : R * R) (ptd0 : SF_seq), Riemann_sum f0 (SF_cons h0 ptd0) = plus (scal (SF_h ptd0 - fst h0) (f0 (snd h0))) (Riemann_sum f0 ptd0) where ?V : [f : R -> R g : R -> R ptd : SF_seq |- ModuleSpace R_Ring]

```coq
intros t.
apply Riemann_sum_norm with (ptd0:=ptd).
- auto.
- intros t0.
apply H0.
auto.
Qed.```
